The Three-Tails releases a mist created by its [[chakra]] to put intruders under an illusion. The illusion  torments the target with events from their past. The illusion will vanish if the victim can break the illusion, either by themselves or with the assistance of another.

[[es:Niebla Ilusoria]]
[[fr:Brume Illusoire]]
